description: This dataset lists the number of public transit stops per United States census tract based on data from the National Transit Map (NTM) as voluntarily reported to NTM by one of 270 regional transit agencies choosing to participate between 2016 and 2018

variables.name: count_ntm_stops
variables.description: Count of transit stops reported to National Transit Map as of 2018

notes: Census tract based on 2010 Census Tract designations
